meta.job_title: Part Time Retail Store Sales Associate

duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and assess customer needs as they come into the store and offer solutions
Mix, tint and match paint to customer request
Suggest and upsell additional products, such as brushes, rollers, and tape
Ensure store is always clean and stocked with paint and other store products
Process orders and payments request in person, over phone, online, and email
Use POS system to receive payments and cash out customers
